Package gov.sandia.gmp.util.numerical.matrix

Class CholeskyDecomposition

java.lang.Object
gov.sandia.gmp.util.numerical.matrix.CholeskyDecomposition
All Implemented Interfaces:
MatrixSolver
public class CholeskyDecomposition extends Object implements MatrixSolver
Cholesky Decomposition.

For a symmetric, positive definite matrix A, the Cholesky decomposition is a lower triangular matrix L so that A = L*L'.

If the matrix is not symmetric or positive definite, the constructor returns a partial decomposition and sets an internal flag that may be queried by the isSPD() method.
